description: Single storey rear extension following demolition of existing conservatory (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance  with drawings:
Pre-Existing Ground Floor Plan (DWG No. MR74001), dated May 2023
Existing Ground Floor Plan (DWG No. 010), dated May 2023
Existing Front Elevation and Pre-Existing Front Elevation (DWG No. MR74015), dated July 2023
Existing and Pre-Existing Elevations (DWG No. MR74016), dated July 2023
Existing and Pre-Existing Side Elevations (DWG No. MR74017), dated July 2023
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding any information submitted with this application, details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development hereby approved is commenced. The details shall be fully implemented as approved.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h), 1.2 (g) and 2.10 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021). | Other than the balconies identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2, no part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
